_sText:
Automatic Grenade Launcher

Rate of fire around 250rpm on fullauto, up to 1000rpm on semi.
Limited range, can be used as mortar for indirect fire.
Rotates full 360Â°.

The RAR includes a playable testmap and the vmf-file for Hammer.

-Open the VMF in Hammer.
-Copy the AGL and paste it into your map.

You can put it in a static place in your map or ungroup and parent its base to a moving object.

Works just fine mounted on trucks, trains, cars etc.

(Unfortunately it gets messed up when rotated in Hammer)

Ingame:
Press E on the grips.
Press A,W,S,D to control.
Left mouse to fire.
Right mouse to detonate grenades midair.
Press E again to leave it.

Based on machine gun turrent_2 made by IKKillMe
